abilities.name: Intimidating Fang
abilities.text: As long as Mightyena is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shakedown
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
